Acupuncture office for rent - $280 (Arapahoe Ave)

arapahoe ave

(google map) (yahoo map)

Room in a busy Acupuncture clinic on Arapahoe Ave near 30th for rent December 1st. Rent is 280/month for 1 room Monday, Tuesday and Thursday before 2pm and Wednesday and Friday after 2pm as well as all weekend. Includes electricity, internet and heat. 1 month deposit and 1 month notice required. There is also an overflow room available sometimes.
You will get occasional referrals and can cover when I am out of town. You would be joining another Acupuncturist and a massage therapist. Email me with your credentials and intention. Thank you
